work-item.field:
Installing Notepad++ Syntax Highlighting
If you want to use Notepad++ you can download Syntax Highliting from following site:
www.unitedplanet.com/forum/index.php?page=Attachment&attachmentID=921&h=37ddf966bf2a21a8aae78422e581b02dc2dffeb9&s=b79de4237a7126e276cef4511cb1860707db85cc 

If you got it open Notepad++ and go the menu Language >Define your language... and import the file as new language
Now it´s available at the bottom as user defined language if you select menu point Language.
Example Image:
Hint: It might be needed to restart your Notepad++ to enable your Velocity language.
